app.name: Plex
app.long_description:
Access Plex On Your Wii! Based off of gave92's WiiBrowser
Shortcuts * B + D-Pad up: Refresh current page * B + D-Pad down: Save page * B + D-Pad left: Browse homepage * B + D-Pad right: Enter new URL * B + (-) key : Go back a page * B + (+) Key: Go forward one page
Credits: Main Coder: Anoynomus Hackers Wii Browser: gave92
